short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Farm Twitch channel points. Auto login for Amiibots

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
-Automatically collect Twitch channel points when you are AFK.
-Refreshes Twitch every 15 minutes, even if your internet drops out the script will refresh the page so you connect back to the stream.
-Automatically clicks "login with twitch" on the Amiibots website after your session times out.
-More features to be planned in the future.
-UI styled after the Amiibots website
-Links to useful resources

Links to official Amiibots sites:
https://www.twitch.tv/amiibots
https://www.amiibots.com

Links to Popular Amiibo Discord servers:
USAC - https://discord.gg/qE9gfbuJY2
Exion Vault - https://discord.gg/YeStyUyMRB


Changelog:
V 1.2.1
-Added quotes and messages submitted by Amiibo trainers
-Added quotes by famous people

v 1.2
-Added UI
-Added links to useful Amiibots pages
-Added links to both Amiibots streams
-Adjusted auto refresh to 15 min instead of 5 min
-Version number displayed

v 1.1
-Added auto login for amiibots.com

v 1.0
-Added 5 min auto refresh
-Added auto claimer
